official_title: To modify the project for flood control, Wood River, Grand Island, Nebraska.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Modifies the project for flood control, Wood River, Grand Island, Nebraska, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out the project at a specified estimated total cost, Federal cost, and non-Federal cost.
